message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,200,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I appreciate you coming back with an offer.  While I understand your position, the value of this product is quite significant.  I could come down to $1,100,000. I believe this price point reflects the true worth of what's being offered.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $950,000. I think this is a fair price for the product.
